info.title: British Geological Survey Sensors API
info.description:
The British Geological Survey (BGS) Sensor API uses Version v1.1 of the OGC SensorThings API.

Paths/Endpoints that are not currently in use have been excluded, i.e. those relating to Actuators, MultiDatastreams, Tasks and TaskingCapabilities.

HistoricalLocations have also been removed.

tags.name: Datastreams
tags.description: The properties observed by a thing, and the type of sensor making the observations, e.g. a CT2X groundwater logger installed in borehole GGA04 measuring Water Temperature.

tags.name: FeaturesOfInterest
tags.description: A feature about which observations are made, e.g. a borehole or a specific sensor monitoring point (location).

tags.name: Locations
tags.description: Current (and previous) location details for each thing, generally lat/long and elevation.

tags.name: Observations
tags.description: Individual measurements recorded at a given point in time.

tags.name: ObservedProperties
tags.description: Dictionary of properties being observed. These can be directly measured or calculated, e.g. Water Temperature, Barometric Pressure.

tags.name: Sensors
tags.description: Dictionary of the instrument types being used to observe properties, e.g. a CT2X Groundwater Logger.

tags.name: Things
tags.description: Real-world sensors that can be integrated into communication network, e.g. a groundwater logger installed in borehole GGA04.

get.summary: Get all datastreams
get.description: Returns all the datastreams provided by this api (subject to any parameters set)

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of elements to skip from the collection

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of elements to return

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the total number of items in the collection should be returned.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The list of properties that need to be returned

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The list of related queries that need to be included in the result

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: A filter query

get.summary: Get information about an individual datastream
get.description: Returns information about the datastream identified by **entityId**

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: The id of the requested entity

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The list of properties that need to be returned

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The list of related queries that need to be included in the result

application/json.description: Water Temperature from BGS Groundwater Logger GGA04 - Measured (C)
application/json.name: GGA04_01 Water Temperature

get.summary: Get information about a things's location
get.description: Returns information about the location for the thing identified by **entityId**

parameters.name: entityId
parameters.description: The id of the requested entity

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of elements to skip from the collection

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of elements to return

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: Flag indicating if the total number of items in the collection should be returned.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The list of properties that need to be returned

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: The list of related queries that need to be included in the result

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: A filter query

count.description: The total number of entities in the entityset

navigationLink.description: A link to a related entity or entity set

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of entities

selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

@iot.selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

name.description: The label or name of the datastream

observationType.description: The observation type for the datastream, as defined by the OGC Observations and Measurements standard

type.description: The type of the observed area, as defined by the OGC Observations and Measurements standard

coordinates.description: The coordinates of the observed area, as defined by the OGC Observations and Measurements standard

phenomenonTime.description: The range of phenomenon times from all observations belonging to the datastream

sen_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Sensor Database that is the source of information for the datastream (SEN_MEASURE.measure_id)

data_type.description: The type of data provided by the datastream (Measured or Calculated), derived from the observed property

access_restriction.description: A description of any access restrictions that apply to metadata and observations associated with this datastream

data_usage.description: A description of any restrictions that apply to the use of metadata and observations from this datastream

publish_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether details of this datastream can be publicly released (set to Y or N)

resultTime.description: The range of result times from all observations belonging to the datastream

name.description: The full name of the unit of measurement

symbol.description: The symbol of the unit of measurement

defintion.description: A URI for the unit of measurement providing a representation of its definition, ideally following the Unified Code for Unit of Measure (UCUM)

@iot.id.description: The Id of the feature of interest

@iot.selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

description.description: A description of the feature of interest

encodingType.description: The encoding type of the 'feature' property

feature.description: The detailed description of the feature of interest, recorded in line with the type defined by the 'encodingType' property

name.description: The label or name of the feature of interest

sen_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Sensor Database that is the source of information for the feature of interest (SEN_FEATURE_OF_INTEREST.foi_id or SEN_SENSOR_LOCATION.sensor_loc_id)

type.description: Indicates the feature of interest type, set to 'SEN_LOC' (Sensor Location) or 'BOREHOLE'

z.description: The elevation (Z) of the sensor location (type 'SEN_LOC' only)

z_crs.description: The vertical co-ordinate reference system of the Z value (type 'SEN_LOC' only)

from_date.description: The time from which the sensor location is effective (type 'SEN_LOC' only)

to_date.description: The time from which the sensor location is no longer effective, where it is not set the location is still active (type 'SEN_LOC' only)

active_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether the sensor location is the active location for a thing (set to Y or N) (type 'SEN_LOC' only)

sobi_bgs_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS SOBI Database that is the source of information for the borehole (type 'BOREHOLE' only)

borehole_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Universal Borehole Index that is the source of information for the borehole (type 'BOREHOLE' only)

drilled_length.description: The drilled length of the borehole in metres (type 'BOREHOLE' only)

reference.description: An alternative name by which the borehole is known (type 'BOREHOLE' only)

reference_type.description: Indicates the source of the 'reference' property (type 'BOREHOLE' only)

publish_yn.description: A flag to indicate whether details of this feature of interest can be publicly released (set to Y or N)

@iot.count.description: The total number of entities in the entityset

@iot.selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

encodingType.description: The encoding type of the 'location' property

location.description: The location, recorded in line with the type defined by the 'encodingType' property

name.description: The label or name of the location

sen_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Sensor Database that is the source of information for the location (SEN_SENSOR_LOCATION.sensor_loc_id)

site.description: The name of the site to which the location belongs

observatory.description: The name of the observatory to which the location belongs

z_crs.description: The vertical co-ordinate reference system of the Z value

from_date.description: The time from which the location is effective

to_date.description: The time from which the location is no longer effective, where it is not set the location is still active

comments.description: Any additional information about the location where available

active_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether the location is the active location for a thing (set to Y or N)

publish_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether details of this location can be publicly released (set to Y or N)

@iot.count.description: The total number of entities in the entityset

@iot.selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

sen_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Sensor Database that is the source of information for the observation (SEN_SENSOR_DATA.sensor_data_id)

publish_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether details of this observation can be publicly released (set to Y or N)

phenomenonTime.description: The time when the observation happened

result.description: The estimated value of the observed property

resultQuality.description: A description of the quality of the result

resultTime.description: The time the result was generated

validTime.description: The time period during which the result can be used

@iot.count.description: The total number of entities in the entityset
The total number of entities in the entityset

@iot.id.description: The Id of the observed property

@iot.selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

definition.description: A URI for the observed property providing a representation of its definition, ideally through reference to a community based vocabulary

description.description: A description of the observed property

name.description: The label or name of the observed property

sen_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Sensor Database that is the source of information for the observed property (DIC_SEN_PROPERTY_TYPE.code)

data_type.description: The type of data provided by the observed property (Measured or Calculated)

formula.description: A description of the formula used to derive values for the observed property (data type 'Calculated' only)

publish_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether details of this observed property can be publicly released (set to Y or N)

@iot.id.description: The Id of the sensor type

@iot.selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

description.description: A description of the sensor type

encodingType.description: The encoding type of the 'metadata' property

metadata.description: A detailed description of the sensor type (style based on 'encodingType' property)

name.description: The label or name of the sensor type

sen_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Sensor Database that is the source of information for the sensor type (DIC_SEN_SENSOR_TYPE.code)

complex_data_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether data from the sensor type is complex, and its data observations are therefore defined for MultiDatastreams rather than Datastreams (set to Y or N)

publish_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether details of this sensor type can be publicly released (set to Y or N)

@iot.count.description: The total number of entities in the entityset

@iot.selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

name.description: The label or name of the thing

sen_id.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Sensor Database that is the source of information for the thing (DIC_SEN_SENSOR.code)

type.description: Indicates the type of thing, set to 'SENSOR'

serial_no.description: The serial number of the physical sensor currently installed if known

data_capture.description: Indicates how data from the thing is captured (Telemetered, Manual)

observation_start_date.description: The earliest observation date for which data from the thing will be available in the API

datum_z.description: The elevation (Z) of the thing's datum

datum_z_crs.description: The vertical co-ordinate reference system of the 'datum_z' value

datum_name.description: The label or name for the thing's datum

borehole_reference.description: The Id of the record in the BGS Sensor Database that is the source of information for the thing (DIC_SEN_SENSOR.code)

access_restriction.description: A description of any access restrictions that apply to metadata and observations associated with this thing

data_usage.description: A description of any restrictions that apply to the use of metadata and observations from this thing

publish_yn\".description: A flag to indicate whether details of this thing can be publicly released (set to Y or N)

@iot.count.description: The total number of entities in the entityset

count.name: $count
count.description: Flag indicating if the total number of items in the collection should be returned.

entityId.name: entityId
entityId.description: The id of the requested entity

expand.name: $expand
expand.description: The list of related queries that need to be included in the result

select.name: $select
select.description: The list of properties that need to be returned

skip.name: $skip
skip.description: The number of elements to skip from the collection

top.name: $top
top.description: The number of elements to return
